'''''Coprinellus niveus''''' ('''''Coprinus nivea''''') or '''"snowy ink cap"'''<ref name="mushfung">{{cite book | title=Mushrooms and Fungi | author=R.Clarke}}</ref> is a [[species]] of [[fungus]] from the [[family (biology)|family]] [[Psathyrellaceae]].<ref>{{cite book | title=Mushrooms:Guide | author=Lesso, T.}}</ref>

==Distribution==
Members of this species are found around the world: in North and Central America,<ref name="dung">{{cite news | title=caribjsci.org/July08/44_206-214.pdf | author=M. J. RICHARDSON}}</ref><ref>{{cite news |author1=Minter, D.W. |author2=M. Rodríguez Hernández |author3=J. Mena Portales  |last-author-amp=yes | title=Fungi of the Caribbean. An annotated checklist}}</ref> [[Europe]].<ref name="mushfung" /><ref>{{cite news |author1=L. Watson |author2=M. J. Dallwitz | title=The Families of Mushrooms and Toadstools Represented in the British Isles}}</ref>
